dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 4939 EH: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 2551 Galena Avenue in Simi Valley, California, as the “Neil Havens Post Office”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.official-title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 2551 Galena Avenue in Simi Valley, California, as the Neil Havens Post Office.

subsection.text: The facility of the United States Postal Service located at 2551 Galena Avenue in Simi Valley, California, shall be known and designated as the Neil Havens Post Office.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the Neil Havens Post Office.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives September 8, 2014.
